comments.body: I don't think we need this anymore if we're always using the same config

You meant the param zkUrlConf? It feels like a good abstraction so that the url configuration can at least be overriden right?
It's an unnecessary abstraction that makes the code more complicated. We can always introduce it later if we actually need it.
actually we probably don't need this method now that we support only one config
